answers.author: Danielle Goodwin
answers.text:
Jean, 
ICMA's Center for Performance Measurement (CPM) asks a question on our Sustainability survey regarding, on-site energy managers. While not exactly the same as environmental affairs manager, of the 20 jurisdictions whose population ranged from 100,000 to 600,000, 14 jurisdiction had a designated on-site energy manager. 
You may contact me personally if you have any additional questions. My email is dgoodwin@icma.org. 
Thank you.
